result.execSummary:
The defendant Sondra D Schneider was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: If probation or extended supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sondra D Schneider

records.addlTxt: Defendant Sondra D Schneider in court with attorney Travis Stephen Slattery.  Derek Dominguez appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Jury trial - 12 person on August 13, 2014 at 08:15 am.

2:51 Defendant Sondra D Schneider in court.  Derek Dominguez appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Not guilty entered.  Atty Dominguez to file an Amended Information with correct occurance date.  Bond continued

2:23 Defendant Sondra D Schneider in court with attorney Travis S Slattery.  Derek Dominguez appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Nathan Dean is sworn as a witness.  Testifies to his employment with Wood County Sheriff's Dept.  Testifies to contact with HPS on 06/17/14 and to his mother being Sondra Schneider.  Testifies to conversation with Sondra at her apartment on an earlier date.  Identifies Sondra Schneider in the courtroom.  Testifies to conversation with HPS regarding occurance the night before involving himself and his mother.  Sondra bit HPS on the arm, pinched him and scratched him.  Testifies to observations of injuries received.  Testifies to conversation with Sondra regarding the incident.  

Atty Slattery cross examines the witness.  Testifies to witnesses he spoke too.  

Court finds probable cause and binds the matter over of Arraignment.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 25, 2014 at 09:00 am.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment on June 26, 2014 at 02:30 pm.

Absolute sobriety, do not enter any establishments that sell alcohol. Comply with Human Services decisions regarding child. Defendant Sondra D Schneider in court with attorney Travis S Slattery.  Defendant Sondra D Schneider in custody.  Craig S Lambert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant Sondra D Schneider in court with attorney Travis Slattery .  Defendant Sondra D Schneider in custody.  Craig S Lambert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Transferred to Branch 2 for preliminary hearing.
